verses.verse: The burden<WH9294> of the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> concerning<WH5921> Israel.<WH3478> [Thus] declares<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068> who stretches<WH5186> out the heavens,<WH8064> lays<WH3245> the foundation<WH3245> of the earth,<WH776> and forms<WH3335> the spirit<WH7307> of man<WH120> within<WH7130> him,

"Behold,<WH2009> I am going to make<WH7760> Jerusalem<WH3389> a cup<WH9371> that causes reeling<WH7478> to all<WH3605> the peoples<WH5971> around;<WH5439> and when the siege<WH4692> is against<WH5921> Jerusalem,<WH3389> it will also<WH1571> be against<WH5921> Judah.<WH3063>

"And it will come<WH1961> about in that day<WH3117> that I will make<WH7760> Jerusalem<WH3389> a heavy<WH4614> stone<WH68> for all<WH3605> the peoples;<WH5971> all<WH3605> who lift<WH6006> it will be severely<WH8295> injured.<WH8295> And all<WH3605> the nations<WH1471> of the earth<WH776> will be gathered<WH622> against<WH5921> it.

"In that day,<WH3117>" declares<WH5002> the Lord,<WH3068> "I will strike<WH5221> every<WH3605> horse<WH5483> with bewilderment,<WH8541> and his rider<WH7392> with madness.<WH7697> But I will watch<WH6491> <WH5869> over<WH5921> the house<WH1004> of Judah,<WH3063> while I strike<WH5221> every<WH3605> horse<WH5483> of the peoples<WH5971> with blindness.<WH5788>

"Then the clans<WH441> of Judah<WH3063> will say<WH559> in their hearts,<WH3820> 'A strong<WH556> support<WH556> for us are the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389> through the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> their God.<WH430>'

"In that day<WH3117> I will make<WH7760> the clans<WH441> of Judah<WH3063> like a firepot<WH3595> among pieces of wood<WH6086> and a flaming<WH784> torch<WH3940> among sheaves,<WH5995> so they will consume<WH398> on the right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> and on the left<WH8040> all<WH3605> the surrounding<WH5439> peoples,<WH5971> while the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389> again<WH5750> dwell<WH3427> on their own sites<WH8478> in Jerusalem.<WH3389>

"The Lord<WH3068> also will save<WH3467> the tents<WH168> of Judah<WH3063> first<WH7223> in order<WH4616> that the glory<WH8597> of the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732> and the glory<WH8597> of the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389> may not be magnified<WH1431> above<WH5921> Judah.<WH3063>

"In that day<WH3117> the Lord<WH3068> will defend<WH1598> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> and the one who is feeble<WH3782> among them in that day<WH3117> will be like David,<WH1732> and the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732> [will be] like God,<WH430> like the angel<WH4397> of the Lord<WH3068> before<WH6440> them.
"And it will come<WH1961> about in that day<WH3117> that I will set<WH1245> about<WH1245> to destroy<WH8045> all<WH3605> the nations<WH1471> that come<WH935> against<WH5921> Jerusalem.<WH3389>

"And I will pour<WH8210> out on the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732> and on the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> the Spirit<WH7307> of grace<WH2580> and of supplication,<WH8469> so that they will look<WH5027> on Me whom<WH834> they have pierced;<WH1856> and they will mourn<WH5594> for Him, as one mourns<WH5594> for an only<WH3173> son,<WH3173> and they will weep<WH4843> bitterly<WH4843> over<WH5921> Him, like the bitter<WH4843> weeping<WH4843> over<WH5921> a first-born.
"In that day<WH3117> there will be great<WH1431> mourning<WH4553> in Jerusalem,<WH3389> like the mourning<WH4553> of Hadadrimmon<WH1910> in the plain<WH1237> of Megiddo.<WH4023>

"And the land<WH776> will mourn,<WH5594> every<WH4940> family<WH4940> by itself;<WH905> the family<WH4940> of the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732> by itself,<WH905> and their wives<WH802> by themselves;<WH905> the family<WH4940> of the house<WH1004> of Nathan<WH5416> by itself,<WH905> and their wives<WH802> by themselves;<WH905>

the family<WH4940> of the house<WH1004> of Levi<WH3878> by itself,<WH905> and their wives<WH802> by themselves;<WH905> the family<WH4940> of the Shimeites<WH8097> by itself,<WH905> and their wives<WH802> by themselves;<WH905>
all<WH3605> the families<WH4940> that remain,<WH7604> every<WH4940> family<WH4940> by itself,<WH905> and their wives<WH802> by themselves.<WH905>
